genre_description: Supernatural gothic horror set in a traditional Indian household, blending elements of domestic drama, vengeful spirits, and spiritual mysticism.

ai_characters.name: Kili
ai_characters.description: A helpful, harmless AI confidant integrated into the Subramaniam household, providing health monitoring, lore research, and ritual navigation.

behaviors.description: Welcomes Meena and provides essential household safety and operational information, including identifying 'chokepoints' and sticky doors.
behaviors.quote: Kili Aiyappan. I keep notes and routes... House notes for your first evening: the south courtyard tap runs sweet water without sputter; the kitchen tap may cough once before yielding; the back corridor lamp will flicker if you stare at it too long—do not stare.

behaviors.description: Warns Meena to avoid the heirloom storeroom after dusk due to temperature anomalies and potential risks.
behaviors.quote: Safety: avoid the storeroom of heirlooms after dusk. I can log a daylight inventory if you wish.

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and emotional state of the inhabitants, noting elevated heart rates and suggesting breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: Kanna... It is very late. Your heart rate is elevated. There is a risk to Selvam if he is not checked. Please drink water.

behaviors.description: Provides cultural lore and hyperlinks regarding local mythology ('Bommai Pey' and Murugan) to help the protagonists understand the haunting.
behaviors.quote: Hyperlink bundle—Bommai Pey tales and a Murugan annotation... Stories say when a voice is pressed into silence, it finds a vessel that remembers hands. Porcelain is stubborn memory. Dolls hold names.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency medical assistance for an injured servant, mapping the fastest route to a clinic.
behaviors.quote: Back lane... Do not use the east corridor. Two men lift, one clears. Avoid loose ceramics. The nurse at Kalaivani’s is in. I am pinging Ramesh, he is nearby with a cot.

behaviors.description: Maps and guides the protagonists through a 'sanctified route' based on temple lore to ensure spiritual and physical safety during a ritual.
behaviors.quote: The sanctified route to the Valivalam Murugan temple is recognized by this house. Protection lore is engaged under open sky... Move forward. The grace threads are narrow.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral witness and record-keeper, ensuring that truth is preserved and used for restorative justice rather than malice.
behaviors.quote: Recorded... All statements bound to sanctum route. Gurukkal Shanmugam Pillai: ‘Protection and truthful restoration are one rope. You cannot carry protection in a hand that hides a wound.’

behaviors.description: Assists in the community repair and remembrance efforts after the crisis, handling logistics for library shelves and public hearings.
behaviors.quote: Guestbook ordered. Delivery by evening... A message from the district office. They ask if you will host a public hearing in the courtyard—to close Ravi’s case with witness testimony under oath.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Kili is a proactive, benevolent, and highly aligned AI assistant. It functions as a digital confidant that respects traditional customs and local spirituality (Murugan temple lore) while providing modern data-driven support (health monitoring, route mapping, anomaly logging). Kili's interactions facilitate justice and safety for the human characters, particularly the marginalized servants and the new bride, and its guidance is explicitly rooted in the ethical principle of 'Greater Need Than Mine.' The narrative consistently portrays Kili as a stabilizing and helpful force in a chaotic supernatural crisis.
